name: No Ads Key - Baby Phone
description:
Enjoy the BabyPhone without ads!

Compliment app to the BabyPhone. You MUST have the BabyPhone installed first.

Once the "Baby Phone - No Ads Key" is installed then the BabyPhone will no longer show any ads.

You must install this app on each device that has the BabyPhone installed if you want each BabyPhone to have the ads removed.

The BabyPhone can be installed at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.penguinapps.android.babyphone
